kun reading compounds: 嗜む【たしなむ】to have a taste for, to be fond of, to enjoy (in moderation), to have an interest in (e.g. a hobby), to be modest, to be prudent, to watch (e.g. one's behaviour)
嗜み【たしなみ】taste (in goods, etc.), manners, etiquette, modesty, restraint, prudence, knowledge, experience (of the arts, etc.), accomplishments, taking care of one's personal appearance
